TypeSignature.Value: public interface IEnumerator<out T> : IDisposable, System.Collections.IEnumerator
.class public interface auto ansi abstract IEnumerator`1<+ T> implements class System.Collections.IEnumerator, class System.IDisposable
Public Interface IEnumerator(Of Out T) Implements IDisposable, IEnumerator
generic <typename T> public interface class IEnumerator : IDisposable, System::Collections::IEnumerator
type IEnumerator<'T> = interface interface IDisposable interface IEnumerator

span.span: The type of objects to enumerate.

summary.span: 支援泛型集合上的簡單反覆運算。

span.span: Supports a simple iteration over a generic collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為所有的泛型列舉程式的基底介面。 is the base interface for all generic enumerators. `foreach` C# 語言的陳述式 (`for each` c + + `For Each` Visual Basic 中) 會隱藏列舉值的複雜度。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in C++, `For Each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建議您使用 `foreach`，而不要直接使用列舉值。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 列舉程式可以用來讀取集合中的資料，但是無法用來修改基礎集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 一開始，列舉程式位在集合中的第一個項目之前。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 在這個位置上， 並未定義。At this position, is undefined. 因此，在讀取 的值之前，必須呼叫 以將列舉值前移至集合的第一個項目。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element. 如果集合，也就是列舉值的結尾是否位於集合中的最後一個元素之後的階段和傳回`false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 列舉值位於此位置，後續呼叫也會傳回`false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果上次呼叫傳回`false`，是未定義。If the last call to returned `false`, is undefined. 您不能再次將 設定為集合的第一個項目；您必須建立新的列舉值執行個體。You cannot set to the first element of the collection again; you must create a new enumerator instance instead. 方法提供 COM 互通性。The method is provided for COM interoperability. 它不一定需要實作;相反地，實作器可以直接擲回。It does not necessarily need to be implemented; instead, the implementer can simply throw a . 不過，如果您選擇這樣做，您應該要確定沒有呼叫者可以依賴功能。However, if you choose to do this, you should make sure no callers are relying on the functionality. 如果變更的集合，例如加入、 修改或刪除元素，列舉值的行為是未定義。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the behavior of the enumerator is undefined. 列舉程式沒有集合的獨佔存取權，因此，列舉集合內容本質上並不是安全的執行緒程序。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure. 若要確保列舉期間的執行緒安全性，您可以在整個列舉期間鎖定集合。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can lock the collection during the entire enumeration. 若要讓多重執行緒能夠存取集合以便進行讀取和寫入，您必須實作自己的同步處理。To allow the collection to be accessed by multiple threads for reading and writing, you must implement your own synchronization. 命名空間中集合的預設實作未同步處理。Default implementations of collections in the namespace are not synchronized. ## Examples 下列範例示範實作介面的自訂物件的集合類別。The following example shows an implementation of the interface for a collection class of custom objects. 自訂的物件是型別的執行個體`Box`，和集合類別是`BoxCollection`。The custom object is an instance of the type `Box`, and the collection class is `BoxCollection`. 此程式碼範例是針對提供之較大範例的一部分介面。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Collections.Generic.BoxExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxexamples/cs/program.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.Generic.BoxExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.collections.generic.boxexamples/vb/program.vb#3)]

span.para: 實作此介面需要實作非泛型介面。並方法不會依賴，並只出現在泛型介面。屬性會出現在這兩個介面，且具有不同的傳回型別。實作非泛型做為明確介面實作的屬性。這可讓非泛型介面的任何取用者使用泛型介面。颾魤 ㄛ會實作，而這需要您實作方法。這可讓您關閉資料庫連接，或使用其他資源時，釋放檔案控制代碼或類似的作業。如果沒有其他要處置的資源，提供空白實作。

Implementing this interface requires implementing the nongeneric interface. The and methods do not depend on , and appear only on the nongeneric interface. The property appears on both interfaces, and has different return types. Implement the nongeneric property as an explicit interface implementation. This allows any consumer of the nongeneric interface to consume the generic interface. In addition, implements , which requires you to implement the method. This enables you to close database connections or release file handles or similar operations when using other resources. If there are no additional resources to dispose of, provide an empty implementation.

public: property T Current { T get(); };

summary.span: 取得集合中位於列舉值目前位置的元素。

span.span: Gets the element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

value.span: 位於列舉值中目前位置的集合中的元素。

span.span: The element in the collection at the current position of the enumerator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 未定義任何下列的情況下： is undefined under any of the following conditions: - 建立列舉值之後，立即列舉值位於集合中的第一個項目之前。The enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection, immediately after the enumerator is created. 列舉值前進到第一個元素的集合，再讀取的值時必須呼叫。 must be called to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . - 在上次呼叫傳回`false`，表示集合的結尾。The last call to returned `false`, which indicates the end of the collection. - 因為在集合中，例如加入、 修改或刪除的項目所做的變更而無效列舉值。The enumerator is invalidated due to changes made in the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements. 會傳回相同的物件直到呼叫 。 returns the same object until is called. 會將 設定為下一個項目。 sets to the next element.

span.para: 實作此介面需要實作非泛型介面。屬性會出現在這兩個介面，且具有不同的傳回型別。實作非泛型做為明確介面實作的屬性。這可讓非泛型介面的任何取用者使用泛型介面。

Implementing this interface requires implementing the nongeneric interface. The property appears on both interfaces, and has different return types. Implement the nongeneric property as an explicit interface implementation. This allows any consumer of the nongeneric interface to consume the generic interface.
